meta.dc:title: HJ 76 ENR: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Department of Education relating to “Borrower Defense Institutional Accountability”.

meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America

Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Department of Education relating to “Borrower Defense Institutional Accountability”.

main.name: HJRES76
main.longTitle: JOINT RESOLUTION Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Department of Education relating to “Borrower Defense Institutional Accountability”.
main.enactingFormula: Resolved by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.content: That Congress disapproves the rule submitted by the Department of Education relating to “Borrower Defense Institutional Accountability” (84 Fed. Reg. 49788 (September 23, 2019)), and such rule shall have no force or effect.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
